item.title: The 25 battery tech startups that just got a piece of $3B in federal funds
item.description:
This tranche of funding went to startups across 14 states, but there were certain winners that will see the bulk of the expected 18,000 jobs to be created as a result of this funding.

item.title: The iPhone 16 launches today without its most hyped feature: Apple Intelligence
item.description:
The iPhone 16 officially goes on sale Friday. But for its earliest adopters, it arrives with a fundamental compromise baked into the deal. Put simply, this is not the iPhone 16 that they were promised. Tim Cook said it would be the “first iPhone built for Apple Intelligence.” But that “for” is key: The handsets […]

item.title: Jim Cramer on Intel Corporation (INTC): It ‘Doesn’t Have The Money To Build Out Everything It Wants To Or Even What It’s Committed To Building’
